descriptor.name: e-Shram Card Registration Facilitator
descriptor.short_desc: Learn to register unorganized sector workers on the e-Shram portal for social security benefits.
descriptor.long_desc:
Course Overview:
This course trains agents on the end-to-end process of e-Shram card registration. It covers identifying unorganized workers, the documents required, the online registration process, and explaining the benefits linked to the e-Shram UAN card, such as accident insurance.

list.value: Construction workers, gig workers, domestic workers, street vendors
